speaker: Saurabh Mishra
quote: Devesh, your ability to creatively solve core AI problems is top-class. Shivam, your robust and scalable API design is the backbone of this feature. And Manish, your commitment to a seamless user experience is what makes our products shine. The way you all collaborated to resolve the integration issues is exactly what I want to see. This is A+ work, team.
rationale: Saurabh attributes specific contributions to each team member and highlights their collaborative efforts, leading to a positive outcome for the project.
evidence: commitment to a seamless user experience
collaborated to resolve the integration issues

speaker: Saurabh Mishra
quote: I will personally send a note of thanks to both of them and make sure their managers are aware of their specific, high-impact contributions. That kind of support deserves to be celebrated.
rationale: Saurabh acknowledges Anjali's and Rohan's specific contributions and their high impact on the project, indicating that their efforts deserve recognition.
evidence: kind of support deserves to be celebrated
